title: Add Authenticated Search Feature E2E Tests
description:
Add end-to-end tests for the authenticated tool search feature focusing on happy path scenarios.

Changes needed:
1. Create search feature E2E test file
2. Add test utilities if needed
3. Add authentication setup for tests

Files to modify:
- backend/test/e2e/search.e2e-spec.ts (new)
- backend/test/utils/test-tools.ts (if needed)

Test scenarios:
1. Verify unauthenticated users are redirected to login
2. Login and search for existing tool
3. Navigate to tool details from search results
4. Verify empty search results message
5. Verify search works after authentication

Testing requirements:
- Focus on happy path only
- Use real API calls (no mocking)
- Test basic search functionality with authentication
- Include login/auth flow in tests

Fulfills:
- Verification of all acceptance criteria in E2E context
- Verification of authentication requirements
